DataElement.preferredName: First Erythrocyte Blood Transfusion Administered Year Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The year the first erythrocyte blood transfusion was administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Cell specialized for oxygen transport, having a high concentration of hemoglobin in the cytoplasm and little else; biconcave, anucleate discs, 7nm diameter in mammals._The infusion of components of blood or whole blood into the bloodstream. The blood may be donated from another person, or it may have been taken from the person earlier and stored until needed._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:Cell specialized for oxygen transport, having a high concentration of hemoglobin in the cytoplasm and little else; biconcave, anucleate discs, 7nm diameter in mammals.:The infusion of components of blood or whole blood into the bloodstream. The blood may be donated from another person, or it may have been taken from the person earlier and stored until needed.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
A blood cell specialized for oxygen transport, having a high concentration of hemoglobin in the cytoplasm. They are biconcave, anucleate discs, with a 6-8um diameter in humans.
The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the numeric representation of the calendar year.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
